name: One Man's War
description:
Chiyou fought against the Yellow Emperor nine battles and nine victories. The Yellow Emperor recruited monks from all over the world, but few of them answered. To avoid the loss of life, you fight alone!

Game features:
1. Bullet screen shooting
2. Talent combination
3.3D Horizontal Version Scene

At present, the game is being developed by a single player. If the update is slow, please forgive me
